text.*:
Sora to Umi no Aida
ソラとウミのアイダ
Game
Developer ForwardWorks
Publisher ForwardWorks
Platform Android, iOS
Released
  • JP: September 28, 2017
Anime television series
Directed by Atsushi Nigorikawa
Written by Takashi Yamada
Studio TMS Entertainment
Original network Tokyo MX, STV, AT-X, BS11, BS Fuji, RCC
Original run October 4, 2018 – scheduled
Anime and Manga portal

Sora to Umi no Aida (ソラとウミのアイダ, lit. "The Space Between the Sky and Sea") is a Japanese media franchise owned by ForwardWorks, with Oji Hiroi credited as the original creator. It primarily consists of a smartphone game, released for Android and iOS on September 28, 2017. A Microsoft Windows version by DMM will be released in Q2 2018.[1] An anime television series adaptation by TMS Entertainment is scheduled to air from October 4, 2018.

Contents

  • 1 Characters
  • 2 Media
    • 2.1 Anime
  • 3 Notes

  • 5 External links

Characters[edit]

Haru Soramachi (空町 春, Soramachi Haru)
Voiced by: Karin Takahashi[2]
Namino Murakami (村上波乃, Murakami Namino)
Voiced by: Rika Tachibana[2]
Rubi Azumi (ルビー・安曇, Azumi Rubī)
Voiced by: Honoka Inoue[2]
Maiko Sakura (櫻 舞湖, Sakura Maiko)
Voiced by: Momoko Suzuki[2]
Makiko Maki (薪 真紀子, Makiko Maki)
Voiced by: Maori Komeno[2]
Makoto Mitsurugi (美剣 真, Mitsurugi Makoto)
Voiced by: Ai Kōsaka[2]

Media[edit]

Anime[edit]

An anime television series adaptation was announced on July 25, 2017.[3] Atsushi Nigorikawa is directing the anime at TMS Entertainment, and Takashi Yamada is in charge of series composition. Shuuhei Yamamoto is drawing the character designs.[2] The series is scheduled to air from October 4, 2018 on Tokyo MX and other channels.[4][a] The opening theme is "Sora to Umi no Aida" (ソラとウミのアイダ) by Karin Takahashi, Honoka Inoue, and Momoko Suzuki under their character names, and the ending theme is "Ao no Kanata" (蒼の彼方, lit. "Beyond the Blue") by Konomi Suzuki.[5][6][7]

Notes[edit]

  1. ^ From the tv network it lists the show at 24:00 on October 3, which is at October 4, 2018 at 12:00 a.m.
